00022 #ifndef INCLUDED_TUIOOBJECT_H
00023 #define INCLUDED_TUIOOBJECT_H
00024 
00025 #include "TuioContainer.h"
00026 
00027 namespace TUIO {
00028         
00035         class LIBDECL TuioObject: public TuioContainer {
00036                 
00037         protected:
00041                 int symbol_id;
00045                 float angle;
00049                 float rotation_speed;
00053                 float rotation_accel;
00054                 
00055         public:
00056                 using TuioContainer::update;
00057                 
00069                 TuioObject (TuioTime ttime, long si, int sym, float xp, float yp, float a):TuioContainer(ttime, si, xp, yp) {
00070                         symbol_id = sym;
00071                         angle = a;
00072                         rotation_speed = 0.0f;
00073                         rotation_accel = 0.0f;
00074                 };
00075 
00086                 TuioObject (long si, int sym, float xp, float yp, float a):TuioContainer(si, xp, yp) {
00087                         symbol_id = sym;
00088                         angle = a;
00089                         rotation_speed = 0.0f;
00090                         rotation_accel = 0.0f;
00091                 };
00092                 
00099                 TuioObject (TuioObject *tobj):TuioContainer(tobj) {
00100                         symbol_id = tobj->getSymbolID();
00101                         angle = tobj->getAngle();
00102                         rotation_speed = 0.0f;
00103                         rotation_accel = 0.0f;
00104                 };
00105                 
00109                 ~TuioObject() {};
00110                 
00126                 void update (TuioTime ttime, float xp, float yp, float a, float xs, float ys, float rs, float ma, float ra) {
00127                         TuioContainer::update(ttime,xp,yp,xs,ys,ma);
00128                         angle = a;
00129                         rotation_speed = rs;
00130                         rotation_accel = ra;
00131                         if ((rotation_accel!=0) && (state==TUIO_STOPPED)) state = TUIO_ROTATING;
00132                 };
00133 
00148                 void update (float xp, float yp, float a, float xs, float ys, float rs, float ma, float ra) {
00149                         TuioContainer::update(xp,yp,xs,ys,ma);
00150                         angle = a;
00151                         rotation_speed = rs;
00152                         rotation_accel = ra;
00153                         if ((rotation_accel!=0) && (state==TUIO_STOPPED)) state = TUIO_ROTATING;
00154                 };
00155                 
00166                 void update (TuioTime ttime, float xp, float yp, float a) {
00167                         TuioPoint lastPoint = path.back();
00168                         TuioContainer::update(ttime,xp,yp);
00169 
00170                         TuioTime diffTime = currentTime - lastPoint.getTuioTime();
00171                         float dt = diffTime.getTotalMilliseconds()/1000.0f;
00172                         float last_angle = angle;
00173                         float last_rotation_speed = rotation_speed;
00174                         angle = a;
00175                         
00176                         double da = (angle-last_angle)/(2*M_PI);
00177                         if (da > 0.75f) da-=1.0f;
00178                         else if (da < -0.75f) da+=1.0f;
00179                                                 
00180                         rotation_speed = (float)da/dt;
00181                         rotation_accel =  (rotation_speed - last_rotation_speed)/dt;
00182                 
00183                         if ((rotation_accel!=0) && (state==TUIO_STOPPED)) state = TUIO_ROTATING;
00184                 };
00185 
00190                 void stop (TuioTime ttime) {
00191                         update(ttime,xpos,ypos,angle);
00192                 };
00193                 
00201                 void update (TuioObject *tobj) {
00202                         TuioContainer::update(tobj);
00203                         angle = tobj->getAngle();
00204                         rotation_speed = tobj->getRotationSpeed();
00205                         rotation_accel = tobj->getRotationAccel();
00206                         if ((rotation_accel!=0) && (state==TUIO_STOPPED)) state = TUIO_ROTATING;
00207                 };
00208                 
00213                 int getSymbolID() const{ 
00214                         return symbol_id;
00215                 };
00216                 
00221                 float getAngle() const{
00222                         return angle;
00223                 };
00224                 
00229                 float getAngleDegrees() const{ 
00230                         return (float)(angle/M_PI*180);
00231                 };
00232                 
00237                 float getRotationSpeed() const{ 
00238                         return rotation_speed;
00239                 };
00240                 
00245                 float getRotationAccel() const{
00246                         return rotation_accel;
00247                 };
00248 
00253                 virtual bool isMoving() const{ 
00254                         if ((state==TUIO_ACCELERATING) || (state==TUIO_DECELERATING) || (state==TUIO_ROTATING)) return true;
00255                         else return false;
00256                 };
00257         };
00258 };
